description:
Avatar Toolkit is currently in ALPHA. Expect bugs and issues during this early development phase.

Having trouble installing? Check our installation guide: Installation Guide

This first release includes essential features for avatar creation:
• Basic Armature Validation System
• Comprehensive Import Support
• Full Pose Mode Features
• FBX and Resonite Export Options
• Optimization Tools Suite
• Custom Avatar Tools
• Viseme Creation
• Eye Tracking Support (Legacy and VRChat SDK3)
• Built-in Updater
• Debug Options

Avatar Toolkit includes an armature validation system. Some tools require either a standard armature or validation to be disabled. Learn more about configuration here: Configuration Guide
